title-group.article-title: FAST INTEGRATION OF HIGHLY OSCILLATORY INTEGRALS WITH EXOTIC OSCILLATORS

abstract.p: In this paper, we present an efficient Filon-type method for the integration of systems containing Bessel functions with exotic oscillators based on a diffeomorphism transformation and give applications to Airy transforms. Preliminary numerical results show the effectiveness and accuracy of the quadrature for large arguments of integral systems.
